item.title: Serena add a quote by Cassandra Clare
Serena add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Serena add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I am a badass, and I recognize that you, too, are a badass." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Serena add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "And in the gunslinger's mind, those words echoed: You dare not." -- Stephen King

item.title: Serena add a quote by Justin Richards
item.description: "Four days after his own funeral, Albert Wilkes came home for Tea." -- Justin Richards

item.title: Serena add a quote by Sir Francis Bacon
item.description: "Some books should be tasted, some devoured, but only a few should be chewed and digested thoroughly." -- Sir Francis Bacon

item.title: Serena add a quote by Cornelia Funke
item.description: "Books have to be heavy because the whole world's inside them." -- Cornelia Funke

item.title: Serena add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Francois Rabelais. He was a poet. And his last words were "I go to seek a Great Perhaps." That's why I'm going. So I don't have to wait until I die to start seeking a Great Perhaps." -- John Green

item.title: Serena add a quote by John Green
item.description: "The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive." -- John Green

item.title: Serena add a quote by John Green
item.description: "What a treacherous thing to believe that a person is more than a person." -- John Green

item.title: Serena add a quote by John Green
item.description: "The town was paper, but the memories were not." -- John Green

item.title: Serena add a quote by Lesley Livingston
item.description: "Sonny pulled Lucky up short and swung around to face Fennrys. "I'm not afraid to die. I just don't want to die surprised. And I swear to all the gods, if the last thought that goes through my mind is 'What the hell was that?' I will hunt you down in the afterlife and punch you in the face throughout eternity." -- Lesley Livingston

item.title: Serena add a quote by Lesley Livingston
Serena add a quote by David Levithan
item.description: "me: why is it upset? shouldn't it be downset? gideon: i will file a lawsuit against the dictionaries first thing tomorrow morning. we're going to tear merriam a new asshole and throw webster inside of it." -- David Levithan

item.title: Serena add a quote by David Levithan
item.description: "All sorts of yayness floods my brain. Love is such a drug." -- David Levithan

item.title: Serena add a quote by John Green
item.description: "NO. No no no. I don't want to screw you. I just love you. When did who you want to screw become the whole game? Since when is the person you want to screw the only person you get to love? It's so stupid, Tiny! I mean, Jesus, who even gives a fuck about sex?! People act like it's the most important thing humans do, but come on. How can our sentient fucking lives revolve around something slugs can do. I mean, who you want to screw and whether you screw them? Those are important questions, I guess. But they're not that important. You know what's important? Who would you die for? Who do you wake up at five forty-five in the morning for even though you don't even know why he needs you? Whose drunken nose would you pick?!" -- John Green

item.title: Serena add a quote by John Flanagan
